Great Women Masters of Art bụ akwụkwọ ntụaka afọ 2003 nke onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nka bụ Jordi Vigué gbakọtara ma dezie ya, nke gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe n'oge ochie.
Okwu mmalite nke akwụkwọ ahụ na-ekwupụta mkpali ya iji mejuputa "mgbidi ncheta ma echiche ndị na-ekweyi" gbasara nka ụmụ nwanyị

Ọ na-ekwupụta ozugbo ihe isi ike nke ijikwa isiokwu sara mbara dị otú ahụ, mana mgbe mkpirikpi banyere ụmụ nwanyị ndị na-ese foto site n'afọ ruo afọ ole ọ bụla gasịrị, o debere aha ya maka ndepụta ụmụnwaanyị a:
